PMMP.functions module

PMMP.functions

This module provides useful classes for functions

class src.PMMP.functions.NumFunc(f)[source]

Bases: object

A numerical function

Provides derivatives of any degree. Basic Usage:: >>> import PMMP.functions >>> func = PMMP.functions.NumFunc(lambda x: x*2) >>> print(func(2)) 4

first_derivative(accuracy: float = 0.01)[source]

Calculates the first derivative. Returns NumFunc object. :param accuracy: The “dx” value in the derivative

nth_derivative(n: int, accuracy=0.01)[source]

Calculates the first derivative. Returns NumFunc object. :param n: The order of the derivative :param accuracy: The “dx” value in the derivative

solve(accuracy=0.01, iterations=10, guess=1, inf=False)[source]

Basic Usage Solves using newtons method :param inf: :param accuracy: :param iterations: :param guess: :return: float
